00009 queue::queue(connection &cn)
00010   :m_conn(cn), m_channel(cn.new_channel()) {
00011   amqp_queue_declare_ok_t *r = amqp_queue_declare(m_conn.m_conn, m_channel,
00012                                             amqp_empty_bytes, 0, 0, 0, 1,
00013                                             amqp_empty_table);
00014   m_conn.check_rpc_reply("Declaring new queue");
00015   m_name = amqp_bytes_malloc_dup(r->queue);
00016 }
00017 
00018 queue::queue(connection &cn, std::string const &name)
00019   :m_conn(cn), m_channel(cn.new_channel()),
00020    m_name(amqp_bytes_malloc_dup(amqp_cstring_bytes(name.c_str()))) {
00021      /* amqp_queue_declare_ok_t *r = */ 
00022      amqp_queue_declare(m_conn.m_conn, m_channel,
00023                         m_name, 0, 0, 0, 1,
00024                         amqp_empty_table);
00025   m_conn.check_rpc_reply("Declaring queue "+name);
00026 }
00027 
00028 queue::~queue() {
00029   m_conn.close_channel(m_channel);
00030 }

00032 // modifiers 
00033 
00034 void queue::configure(bool no_local, bool no_ack, bool exclusive) {
00035   amqp_basic_consume(m_conn.m_conn, m_channel, m_name, amqp_empty_bytes,
00036                    no_local, no_ack, exclusive, amqp_empty_table);
00037   m_conn.check_rpc_reply("Setting consumption");
00038 }
00039 
00040 void queue::bind(std::string const &exchange, std::string const &key) {
00041   if( exchange.empty() ) 
00042     throw connection::error("bind: Exchange name cannot be empty");
00043   else {
00044     amqp_bytes_t exch, k;
00045     
00046     if( key.empty() ) 
00047       k = amqp_empty_bytes;
00048     else 
00049       k = amqp_bytes_malloc_dup(amqp_cstring_bytes(key.c_str()));
00050     exch = amqp_bytes_malloc_dup(amqp_cstring_bytes(exchange.c_str()));    
00051 
00052     amqp_queue_bind(m_conn.m_conn, m_channel, m_name, exch, k, amqp_empty_table);
00053     m_conn.check_rpc_reply("bind(\""+exchange+"\", \""+key+"\")");    
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 boost::shared_ptr<queue::message> queue::consume() {
00058   int ret;
00059   amqp_frame_t             frame;
00060   amqp_basic_deliver_t    *deliver;
00061   amqp_basic_properties_t *props;
00062   boost::shared_ptr<message> result;
00063 
00064   // Wait for an header 
00065   do {
00066     amqp_maybe_release_buffers(m_conn.m_conn);
00067     ret = amqp_simple_wait_frame(m_conn.m_conn, &frame);
00068     if( ret<0 ) {
00069       std::ostringstream oss;
00070       oss<<"Error while waiting for a new frame (ret="<<ret<<')';
00071       throw connection::error(oss.str());
00072     }
00073   } while( AMQP_FRAME_METHOD!=frame.frame_type &&
00074           AMQP_BASIC_DELIVER_METHOD!=frame.payload.method.id );
00075 
00076   // Extract information about the source of the message
00077   deliver = (amqp_basic_deliver_t *)frame.payload.method.decoded;
00078   std::string exchange(static_cast<char *>(deliver->exchange.bytes),
00079                      deliver->exchange.len), 
00080     key(static_cast<char *>(deliver->routing_key.bytes), 
00081        deliver->routing_key.len);
00082   ret = amqp_simple_wait_frame(m_conn.m_conn, &frame);
00083   if( ret<0 ) 
00084     throw connection::error("Error while waiting for header frame");
00085   if( AMQP_FRAME_HEADER!=frame.frame_type ) 
00086     throw connection::error("Unexpected non header frame");
00087   
00088   // Extract message size from the header 
00089   props = (amqp_basic_properties_t *)frame.payload.properties.decoded;
00090   size_t target_size = frame.payload.properties.body_size,
00091     cur_size = 0;
00092   
00093   result.reset(new message(exchange, key, target_size));
00094 
00095   char *bytes = result->m_body;
00096 
00097   while( cur_size<target_size ) {
00098     ret = amqp_simple_wait_frame(m_conn.m_conn, &frame);
00099     if( ret<0 ) {
00100       delete[] bytes;
00101       throw connection::error("Error while waiting for message body");
00102     }
00103     if( AMQP_FRAME_BODY!=frame.frame_type ) {
00104       delete[] bytes;
00105       throw connection::error("Unexpected frame while receiving message body");
00106     }
00107     char *ptr = (char *)frame.payload.body_fragment.bytes;
00108     std::copy(ptr, ptr+frame.payload.body_fragment.len, bytes+cur_size);
00109     cur_size += frame.payload.body_fragment.len;
00110   }
00111   return result;
00112 }
